titleStmt.title: The exaltation of the kingdome and priesthood of Christ In certaine sermons vpon the 110. Psalme: preached in the Cathedrall Church and city of Worcester, in the time of Christmasse: anno Domini: 1596. By Rob. Abbot, doctor of Diuinitie, sometime felow of Baliol Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.

notesStmt.note: Cropped at head, affecting running title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
